page.title: 20LIFE STYLES AND CONCLUSION
page.content: This is an area of great natural beauty,with some people happy to commute daily 15 miles to Shrewsbury to have the pleasure of living in such surroundings.The changing character of the area has not meant, however, that it has lost its original working class roots.The scattered population has a very active community spirit, basically because the area remains one of small hill farmers who must recieve help from neighbours to survive- and in return give aid to others.There is a happy mix of newcomers and the indigenous community without any divisions between them.The pace of life is rural and the people warm and friendly On behalf of Snailbeach WI we would especially like to thank Ron Kinrade,Dennis and Janet Wilkinson and all who gave valuable assistance JUDY HOWARD AND SUE JOHNSON
